item.title: Internet Security (Active Article)
item.description: Hiding From the Internet – Making a Plan * Information largely *taken* from the EFF1 What do you want to hide? How bad are the consequences if I fail? How Likely is it That I will Need to Protect it? How Much Trouble am I Willing to go Through to try to Prevent Potential Consequences? Security Planning as a Regular Practice How far are you Willing to go? Simple Security Measures Browser Add-ons Firewalls Encryption in Communication Moderate Difficulty Actions GPG - Encrypt on your own!
